name: WarpTile
description:
Warptile/ WarpinPieces is a 2D puzzle game set in space. By using the power of a warp drive you are moving the very space itself around you. Mine asteroids, avoid supernovas, hassle with alien pirates and discover the advantages of Wormholes in 50 Levels. Three different difficulties and randomly generated maps will keep you on your toes. Solve ever changing puzzles while experiencing a sci-fi story with twists and tragedy.

-easy to learn, hard to master concept (tutorial shall help you get into the game)

-increasing number of different tiles with different concepts will keep you entertained.

-Levels generate randomly to increase replay value and get more and more difficult

-800x600 resolution

-Pixel Art
